lines.text:
[a German fighter has just passed extremely close under the belly of the plane, right past Rascal]
That guy had blue eyes!
Sir, if they found out they'd put my hot dog in a bun and chow down.
Fuel gauge is shot. How long can we fly on one engine?
I don't know. I guess we'll find out.
[Rascal has just blown up a fighter]
And your mother, too!
Uh, we ain't going to Krautville. Our plane's broke.
No, it's fixed.
Christ, let's go break it.
You try that again, and I'll kill you!

[in a drunken stupor]
I don't want to die. I DON'T WANNA DIE! I don't wanna die...
Hey guys, we're delayed. There's cloud cover over the target.
Aw, son of a bitch!
SNAFU! Situation normal...
All fucked up!
Yeah Luke, why go back to the daily grind of being a lifeguard? Take it easy!
Hey is that your new plane out there?
Yeah, Mother and Country.
Mother and Country?
[everyone together]
Awwww!
We had our first practice today.
Oh yeah? How'd it go?
Well, we need a couple more. If you guys have any advice...?
Yeah, get a gun, shoot yourself in the foot, and go home!
Now, that's good advice!
Hey, are those size eights? How about leaving a little will saying when you get your ass shot off on your first mission that those nice, shiny new pumps come to me, huh?

[on seeing flak damage]
There's a hole as big as my dick in the left wing.
[Danny takes a picture of jack shaving]
Awwwww No! I can see it, I get back home, I'm doin' it to the wife, the door breaks open and theres Danny takin' a picture!
[Danny takes a picture of Eugene dancing with a young woman]

[smiles]
Hey Genie! I'm sending this to you wife!

[searching through the barracks]
Has anyone seen my Saint Anthony's medal?
Isn't he the patron saint of lost things?
Yeah, I can't find it.
I know exactly what I'm gonna do...
Oh God, Virg, if I have to hear one more word about that stupid restaurant...
It's not stupid! At least I've got a plan! What are you gonna do after the war, huh?
Come to your restaurant and rob it!
And if we don't drop these bombs right in the pickle barrel there are going to be a lot of innocent people killed.
What's the difference? They're all Nazis!

[the cockpit is covered in blood and the pilots are shouting]
Sir!, It's Tomato Soup!
These powdered eggs would gag a buzzard.

[voiceover]
This is the religious one. There's always a religious one. "Eugene McVey from Cleveland." There's always one from Cleveland. "Nineteen, high-strung, always coming down with something." How'd he get in this bunch?

[Gene nervously fires at German fighters while they are still out of range]
I said hold your fire!

[Mocking]
Hahaha, that was Genie the Weenie.
Shut up, Jackass!
